name: The Indestructibles: Stages of Guilt
description:
This game uses the platforming genre to explore the mind of a man coping with the murder of his child.  His guilt and subconscious panic over the ordeal is reflected with the floating character movement and periodically frantic movement of monsters as he is lost in a world with no easy escape and with periodic flashbacks to the horrific event. As he travels further and further into his thoughts, indescribable monsters turn into figures of his lost daughter as he comes to terms with what he's done....

Use ESC to exit the game at anytime .... not that you'd want to of course ;)
